it.polimi.se2018.model

Class Track

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.utils.Observable
      • it.polimi.se2018.model.Track
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Track
extends Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class representing the Game's Track, where the leftover dices from the DraftPool are kept at the end of every Round. The dices are stacked if more than one.
    Author:
    Lorenzo Minto
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public java.util.List<Dice> getDicesFromSlotNumber(int slotNumber)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • takeDice

        public void takeDice(Dice dice,
                     int slotNumber)
              throws BadDiceReferenceException
        Removes the specified dice kept on the TrackSlot with specified slot number.
        Parameters:
        dice - the dice to be removed.
        slotNumber - the TrackSlot number from which to remove the dice.
        Throws:
        BadDiceReferenceException - if the dice does not exist

      • putDice

        Parameters:
        dice - the dice to be put.
        slotNumber - the TrackSlot number on which to put the dice.
